sentence.Network_en: Each Blackfoot tribe was divided into several hunting bands led by one or more chiefs.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一黑脚人部落分为若干狩猎群组,由一名或多名首领领导.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explore the causes of blackfoot disease in Taiwan.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨台湾乌脚病的病因.

sentence.Network_en: Blood : a tribe of the Blackfoot confederacy inhabiting southern alberta.
sentence.Network_cn: 布拉德族: 在南艾伯塔居住的黑脚族的一支部落.

list.abs: Objective To explore the causes of blackfoot disease in Taiwan ., 目的探讨台湾乌脚病的病因.
所以此病俗称黑脚病(blackfoot disease)或乌乾蛇。在当时并未引起广泛注意或引发继续探查可能致病原因的线索。 直到民国四十三(1954)年,由高聪明及高上荣医师以「特.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a warlike group of Algonquians living in the northwestern plains
2. any of the Algonquian languages spoken by the Blackfoot people
